name: RSS2FB
description: Extracts your RSS Feed and automatically post it on your Facebook page through Graph API

FB_PAGE_ID.description: Facebook page ID located in your settings > about section

FB_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your long lived page access token see: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/54520210/how-to-generate-never-expires-facebook-access-token

RSS_FEEDS.description: Comma delimited URL(s) of your RSS feed on http protocol
